text: Yves Bur, 2014. Yves Bur (born 10 March 1951 in Strasbourg) is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He has been elected in the 4th constituency of the Bas-Rhin department and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:People from Strasbourg Category:Centre of Social Democrats politicians Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Yves Bur
